Lyric:
[00:04.710]You know that I'm a crazy bitch
[00:06.520]I do what I want, when I feel like it
[00:09.150]All I wanna do is lose control, oh oh
[00:13.680]But you don't really give a shit
[00:15.700]Ya go with it, go with it, go with it
[00:18.430]'Cause you're fuckin' crazy Rock 'N' Roll
[00:21.500]You-ou said "hey! what's your name?"
[00:26.100]It took one look and now I'm not the same
[00:30.250]Yeah, you said "Hey" 
[00:32.870]And since that day
[00:35.160]You stole my heart and you're the one to blame
[00:39.380]Yeahhh and that's why I smile
[00:44.110]It's been a while
[00:46.260]Since everyday and everything has felt this right
[00:51.610]And now, you turn it all around
[00:55.400]And suddenly you're all I need the reason why
[00:59.960]I, I, I, I smile, ile, ile, ile
[01:08.430]Last night I blacked out I think
